short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SERP Preview Tool. Visualize how your site will appear on Google. Zero special permissions required. No signup. No ads. No tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Just SERP Preview" browser extension is a simple, privacy-friendly way to glimpse how your site will look on Google Search Results Page (SERP). Here are some features that make it stand out:

- SERP preview of any site. Works with any site, including localhost.
- Make it SEO friendly. Hints on how to format your meta tags and how long they should be.
- Date, Rating, Mobile views. Toggle different SERP features to see how they look.
- No special permissions required. You can trust that your information is secure as our extension does not need any special permissions to run.
- No 3rd party trackers or ads. We value your privacy and ensure that the extension does not contain third-party trackers or ads that may compromise your data.
- Memory-efficient. The extension only runs when you click the icon, so it won't slow down your device with unnecessary background processes.
- Dark mode. Choose between the light and dark modes.

What's the catch / why it's free?

This extension is created by HeroTofu.com, we have both free and paid products. Our paid products help pay for the cost of creating and maintaining the free ones, like the "Just SERP Preview" extension.

This means we can give you the extension for free, without any hidden costs.
